text: In the first paragraph of the Quixote, Cervantes says that the hedgehog lived with a maid, a niece and a field and square boy. Throughout the novel this young man hopes Cervantes will speak of him again. But after two parts, one hundred twenty-six chapters and more than a thousand pages the novel concludes and the young man from the countryside and plaza Cervantes adds not a word more. FIN 1984
title: Crueldad de Cervantes
author: Marco Denevi
